conclusion: Understand the flow of liquid through the baffles and how it will be directed into containers E and F.
Baffles are labeled A, B, C, and D with colors: A is yellow, B is green, C is blue, D is orange.
Liquid will flow from the top and pass through baffles in order A, B, C, and D. Direction indicated by arrows.
Liquid will first pass through baffle A.
Liquid will then pass through baffle B.
Liquid will next pass through baffle C.
Liquid will finally pass through baffle D.
Liquid will exit baffle D and enter a container labeled E or F.
Color of liquid determined by last baffle it passes through, which is D (orange).
Orange liquid will flow into container F.
